data.description:
**[Early Access]**

# Moviola: Your XR Video Studio on Meta Quest

Moviola is a mixed reality video editor designed exclusively for Meta Quest.  
Ditch the keyboard and mouse for an immersive, hands-on editing experience.

# Features:
- Intuitive Editing: Use natural hand gestures to manipulate your footage.
- Immersive Previews: Watch your edits in passthrough, movie theater or a living room.
- Seamless Workflow: Save, reload, and export your projects to XML effortlessly.

# How to import your footage using Moviola Digest:
- Go to xr.dev.br/moviola-digest for instructions.
# How to import your footage without using Moviola Digest:
- Upload your video and audio files to Quest/Movies (the folder already exists). The video extension must be **.mp4**, the audio extension must be **.ogg** and they should be the exact same length.

**Important:** This app is not ready for professional work as the development is still in progress. You might have fun though as it is quite a unique way of editing your footage. I will appreaciate your purchase to support the project and also will be waiting for your feedback! Enjoy!

# Extra screenshots:
